lore: The smasha squig has a skull so hard it can stave in armour and pulverise bone. To compensate for a lifetime of perpetual concussion, nature has furnished smasha squigs with virtually no brain power; therefore only the most belligerent Nobz can keep these beasts pointed at the enemy long enough to make impact.

otherAbilities.Hogboss:: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .
otherAbilities.Hunt Them Down:: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh! , this modelâ€™s big choppa has the [ANTI-MONSTER 3+] and [ANTI-VEHICLE 3+] abilities.
